abstract: Whenever I review something that affects so many people, I can count on getting a lot of feedback — and I did, even though the review appeared only last night. Here’s a sampling, with my responses.

lead_paragraph: Today's a big day for Microsoft: Windows 7 comes out today. Virtually everybody considers it an improvement over Windows Vista. (Not everyone considers it an improvement on Windows XP, though, as you'll see in a moment.)

headline.main: Pogue Answers Reader Questions on Windows 7
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
